member.name: T:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager
member.summary: Custom paging control for ASP.NET web form application。
member.remarks:
AspNetPager is a free custom paging control for ASP.NET web form application. It's independent of any underlying data sources and data controls. It's flexible and powerful, has many features, it support both post back and url paging.
In order to use AspNetPager control, at least specify the value of property and write event handlers for or events, you can bind and display data using data controls or write custom data displaying logics in these event handlers.
member.example:
The following sample shows how AspNetPager can be used to add paging functionality to Repeater control。 <%@ Register Assembly="AspNetPager" Namespace="Wuqi.Webdiyer" TagPrefix="webdiyer" %> <%@Import NameSpace="System.Data"%> <%@Import NameSpace="System.Data.SqlClient"%> AspNetPager Samples
<%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"orderid")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"orderdate","{0:d}")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem, "companyname")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"customerid")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"employeename")%>
Stored procedure code: CREATE PROCEDURE P_GetPagedOrders2005 @startIndex INT, @pageSize INT AS begin WITH orderList AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY O.orderid DESC)AS Row, O.orderid,O.orderdate,O.customerid,C.CompanyName,E.FirstName+' '+E.LastName as EmployeeName from orders O left outer join Customers C on O.CustomerID=C.CustomerID left outer join Employees E on O.EmployeeID=E.EmployeeID) SELECT orderid,orderdate,customerid,companyName,employeeName FROM orderlist WHERE Row between @startIndex and @startIndex+@pageSize-1 end

member.name: E:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PageChanging
member.summary: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation.

member.name: E:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PageChanged
member.summary: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation.
member.remarks: When is url paging mode, this event will occur everytime page is loaded.
member.example:
The following example demonstrates how to write an event handler for the PageChanged event and binding data in the event handler: <%@ Register Assembly="AspNetPager" Namespace="Wuqi.Webdiyer" TagPrefix="webdiyer" %> <%@Import NameSpace="System.Data"%> <%@Import NameSpace="System.Data.SqlClient"%> AspNetPager Samples
<%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"orderid")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"orderdate","{0:d}")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem, "companyname")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"customerid")%> <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem,"employeename")%>
Stored procedure used by this example: CREATE PROCEDURE P_GetPagedOrders2005 @startIndex INT, @pageSize INT AS begin WITH orderList AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY O.orderid DESC)AS Row, O.orderid,O.orderdate,O.customerid,C.CompanyName,E.FirstName+' '+E.LastName as EmployeeName from orders O left outer join Customers C on O.CustomerID=C.CustomerID left outer join Employees E on O.EmployeeID=E.EmployeeID) SELECT orderid,orderdate,customerid,companyName,employeeName FROM orderlist WHERE Row between @startIndex and @startIndex+@pageSize-1 end

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ShowNavigationToolTip
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tooltips are shown when the mouse moves over paging elements.
member.value: true if tooltips are shown for the paging elements; otherwise false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.NavigationToolTipTextFormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the formatting to be applied to the navigation tooltip, for example "go to page {0}".

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.NumericButtonTextFormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the text formatting to be applied to the numeric paging buttons, for example "[{0}]" or "-{0}-".

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.CurrentPageButtonTextFormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets the text formatting to be applied to the current page paging button.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PagingButtonType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of numeric paging buttons, can be either text or image, default value is text.
member.example:
The following example shows how to use image buttons:
<Webdiyer:AspNetPager runat="server" id="pager1" OnPageChanged="ChangePage" PagingButtonType="image" ImagePath="images" ButtonImageNameExtension="n" DisabledButtonImageNameExtension="g" ButtonImageExtension="gif" CpiButtonImageNameExtension="r" PagingButtonSpacing="10px"/>

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.NumericButtonType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the numeric paging buttons.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PagingButtonLayoutType
member.summary: Gets or sets the layout type of all paging buttons.
member.value: One of the values. The default is None.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.CurrentPageButtonPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the current page paging button.
member.value: One of the values. The default is Fixed.

member.value: One of the values. The default is BothSides.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.NavigationButtonType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of navigation buttons(first/last/prev/next).

member.value: A Unit that represents the horizontal spacing between paging buttons. Default value is 5px.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ShowMoreButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the more... paging buttons are displayed.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.FirstPageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display for the first-page button.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PrevPageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display for the prev-page button.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.NextPageText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display for the next-page button.

member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display for the last-page button.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.NumericButtonCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of numeric page buttons to display in the AspNetPager.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ShowDisabledButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether disabled buttons are displayed.
member.remarks: When current page is the first page, the first and prev paging buttons are disabled; when current page is last page, the last and next paging buttons are disabled.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ImagePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the image path when paging button type is set to image.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ButtonImageExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file extension of paging buttons, such as "gif" or "jpg".

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ButtonImageNameExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file name extension of paging buttons.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.CpiButtonImageNameExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file name extension of the current page paging button.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.DisabledButtonImageNameExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the image file name extension of the disabled paging buttons.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ButtonImageAlign
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the image buttons.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.UrlPaging
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether url paging is enabled.
member.remarks: When this value of UrlPaging is set to true, page index will be passed through url parameter instead of ViewState.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.UrlPageIndexName
member.summary: Gets or sets the url parameter name for the page index when in url paging mode. Default value is "page".

remarks.note: When there are multiple AspNetPager controls on the same page and UrlPaging is set to true, you must specify a different UrlPageIndexName for each AspNetPager control.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.UrlPageSizeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the page size parameter name in url. If the value of this property is not null and great than 0, then the PageSize property will use this value as the default value.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.ReverseUrlPageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether url page index is reversed when in url paging mode.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.CurrentPageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the current page index.

remarks.note: Ths value of CurrentPageIndex starts with 1, not 0.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.RecordCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the total records count to be paged.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PagesRemain
member.summary: Gets the remaining page numbers after current page.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of records to display on a page.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.RecordsRemain
member.summary: Gets or sets the total remaining records after current page.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.EndRecordIndex

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the total page count.

member.summary: Gets or sets the css styles to be applied to the custom info region.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.CustomInfoHTML
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML to be displayed in the custom info region.
member.example:
The following example demonstrates how to set the customized text in the custom info region:
<webdiyer:aspnetpager id="AspNetPager1" runat="server" horizontalalign="Center" onpagechanged="AspNetPager1_PageChanged" showcustominfosection="Left" width="100%" CustomInfoHTML="Page %CurrentPageIndex% of %PageCount%  Records %StartRecordIndex% - %EndRecordIndex%"> </webdiyer:aspnetpager>

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.EnableUrlRewriting
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether url rewriting is enabled.
member.remarks: When this property value is set to true, the value of UrlPaging property will be set to true automatically.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.UrlRewritePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the url rewrite pattern for paging urls generation when in url paging mode.
member.example:
The following example demonstrates how to set UrlRewritePattern property:
<webdiyer:aspnetpager id="AspNetPager1" runat="server" horizontalalign="Center" width="100%" UrlPaging="true" EnableUrlRewriting="true" UrlRewritePattern="./listpage_{0}.aspx" OnPageChanged="AspNetPager1_PageChanged"></webdiyer:aspnetpager>

members.member: Gets or sets the url rewrite pattern for the url of the first page when in url paging mode. added on 2012-11-11

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.AlwaysShow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether AspNetPager is always shown even there's only one page of data. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Wuqi.Webdiyer.AspNetPager.AlwaysShowFirstLastPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first and last numeric paging buttons are always shown.

member.summary: Gets or sets the error message displayed to the client when user entered page index is not valid.
